summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.7°C) and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5067 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 10624 lux), cloud levels (up 1816 m), outside temperature (up 1.5°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 233.3m lower than yesterday, 727.5m lower than the past week, 1815.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 833.6m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1561.1m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and little or no wind. Moderate rainfall, occasional overcast conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
